title: Can I play my Pixel 3a on-device music using Google Assistant without enabling Web Activity?
content: I can't control my Pixel 3a from my car to play songs that are on my device, so I'm trying Google assistant, but that doesn't seem to work unless I enable Web Activity which I don't want to.  Is it possible for Google Assistant to play music that is already on my device without enabling Web Activity?
category: Google Assistant and Voice Actions, Google Pixel 3a
